message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing opportunity to purchase this incredible product. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start with a price of $1200000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure it's a good deal for me.

I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm not losing out. Let's try $1050000. This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $1000000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $950000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure it's a good deal for me.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I've already compromised quite a bit. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much. Let's try $1025000. This is as low as I can go and still make a profit.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above $1000000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1010000. This is my final offer, and I'm willing to walk away if you can't meet me here.
I understand you're firm on your price, but I'm not willing to give up any more margin. I'm willing to meet you at $1050000, but I'm not going any lower. This is my final offer.
